title: Secret Publisher Category Data
description:
No longer do just publishing companies have access to key data about categories and book trends in order to plan their launches and make their decisions on what is hot. 

Users of Publisher Rocket, not only get to see all the Categories on Amazon, and the sales you’d need to make in order to hit #1, but they too can now see category trends and data that the publishing companies use as well - all of which is in our latest new feature.  

So, make sure to download your latest version of Publisher Rocket to get this awesome new update!
